portabat.
content.question: How is the sentence translated?

choices.label: In the second month, the ship was carrying Alexandrian grain from Rome.
In the second month, the ship will carry Alexandrian grain to Rome.
For two months, the Alexandrian ship was carrying grain to Rome.
Within two months, the Alexandrian ship will carry Roman grain.

content.answer: For two months, the Alexandrian ship was carrying grain to Rome.
